metadata.name: An old occupation; Saddler
metadata.description:
Saddle is a device that used for beast of burden like horse and donkeys to get on and cargo handing. And saddler is a person who makes saddles.
 
I want you to meet Nizami Semerci who is the last maker of saddler. he is the one whose surname derives from saddle. He started this job when he was 8, helper of his father. He has been making saddlers for 70 years this job is heirloom. 

He says “ in the past people comes from the villages and towns have me sew saddles. They comes lines and sometimes sleeps in front of our house door but now the things changes. We don’t even have a donkey to sew a saddle. Now the saddles we make are in the museums.  But now the saddles we made don’t even get old they just get showed in the museums.” The job saddler was one very popular but now it extincts...

Artist:Ufuk Turpcan
Lens: FE 16-35mm F4 ZA OSS
Camera:Sony A7II
Dimensions:4735X3157
Resolution:300dpi
Location:İzmir,Turkey
Date:5/9/2019
Edition:1/1
